channel.title: creative process on
channel.description: Recent content in creative process on

item.title: Chain smoking—no, composting
item.description: Austin Kleon has written for years about the creative process of chain smoking. It’s never resonated with me; I can’t be that person of work every day even while a project is in progress.

item.title: Linguistic play as a writing exercise
item.description: I’ve taken up this sense of linguistic play as a writing exercise, especially when I’ve just read a bunch of academic papers and I’m having trouble shaking my thoughts free of Nominalization Accumulation Enunciation Contamination.
